Title: The myth of the chemical cure: A critique of psychiatric drug treatment
Source: The Myth of the Chemical Cure: A Critique of Psychiatric Drug Treatment
Abstract: © Joanna Moncrieff 2008.This book overturns the idea that psychiatric drugs work by correcting chemical imbalance and analyzes the professional, commercial and political vested interests that have shaped this view. It provides a comprehensive critique of research on drugs including antidepressants, antipsychotics and mood stabilizers.
